net.myorb.math.matrices

Class SimultaneousEquations<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.math.SignManager
      • net.myorb.math.ComputationConfiguration<T>
        • net.myorb.math.Arithmetic<T>
          • net.myorb.math.ListOperations<T>
            • net.myorb.math.matrices.MatrixOperations<T>
              • net.myorb.math.matrices.SimultaneousEquations<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of component values on which operations are to be executed
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignManagementOperations

    public class SimultaneousEquations<T>
extends MatrixOperations<T>
    methods for finding solutions to simultaneous equations
    Author:
    Michael Druckman
